channel.title: Halloween =D
channel.description: ok here we go!is anyone excited about halloween? yes or no. but anyways. i am posting this thread because i want to warn you about something that grew tremendously in the U.S (united States), you know the candy apples and the other eatable halloween treats, well there is a problem with some of that, people like to see other people get hurt, so they injected some kind of drug i will get the name for you soon as possible, but they also insert objects in there, for example, razor blades, :( knives, :( minature knives of course... but that's not the point i know everyone on here isn't stupid enough to bite into a razor blade or a knife lol. but for the under aged kids, well. if you're on this you're tremendously smart, just watch out on halloween, take caution when eating you're sweets + goods, and don't be in a hurry to eat away, because eating it slow and checking it is better than not eating it at all (cuts on the mouth etc.) +well that's what im here to tell you, feel free to post comments, and reply to me please. i like questions, questions! questions! questions! =D, HAPPY HALLOWEEN!!!

item.title: Halloween =D
item.dc:creator: @god_of_huckalu god of huckalu
item.description:
@god_of_huckalu wrote:

ok here we go!is anyone excited about halloween? yes or no.
but anyways. i am posting this thread because i want to warn you about something that grew tremendously in the U.S (united States), you know the candy apples and the other eatable halloween treats, well
there is a problem with some of that, people like to see other people get hurt, so they injected some kind of drug i will get the name for you soon as possible, but they also insert objects in there, for example, razor blades, knives, minature knives of course…
but that’s not the point
i know everyone on here isn’t stupid enough to bite into a razor blade or a knife lol.
but for the under aged kids,
well.
if you’re on this you’re tremendously smart, just watch out on halloween, take caution when eating you’re sweets + goods, and don’t be in a hurry to eat away, because eating it slow and checking it is better than not eating it at all (cuts on the mouth etc.)
+well that’s what im here to tell you, feel free to post comments, and reply to me please.
i like questions, questions! questions! questions! =D, HAPPY HALLOWEEN!!!
